    def find_element(self, by=By.ID, value=None):
        """
        Find an element given a By strategy and locator. Prefer the find_element_by_* methods when
        possible.
    
        :Usage:
            element = driver.find_element(By.ID, 'foo')
    
        :rtype: WebElement
        """
        if self.w3c:
            if by == By.ID:
                by = By.CSS_SELECTOR
                value = '[id="%s"]' % value
            elif by == By.TAG_NAME:
                by = By.CSS_SELECTOR
            elif by == By.CLASS_NAME:
                by = By.CSS_SELECTOR
                value = ".%s" % value
            elif by == By.NAME:
                by = By.CSS_SELECTOR
                value = '[name="%s"]' % value
        return self.execute(Command.FIND_ELEMENT, {
            'using': by,
>           'value': value})['value']
